title: Kaldi's Coffeehouse
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Organic, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Coffee shop serving coffee drinks, pastries, smoothies, and a small food menu (reportedly no longer all veg as of Oct 2012) which includes grilled eggplant panini. Please confirm if the vegan options are good enough to keep this listing on HappyCow. Has Wi-Fi.
